requirement_tested: A homepage with a form for customers to submit travel package requests
user_persona: A golf enthusiast planning a vacation.
user_goal: To submit a travel package request with personal and preference details.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Alex visits the homepage to find a travel package for an upcoming golf trip. He sees a centered form inviting him to fill in his travel preferences.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage URL in browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Homepage loads with a visible form titled 'Golf Travel Package Request' featuring fields like Full Name, Email, Preferred Travel Dates, etc.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Form Fields
narrative_steps.description: Alex begins filling out the form, entering his name, email, selecting dates, choosing accommodation type, and specifying golf course preferences.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in each form field accurately. Select options from dropdowns and checkboxes as needed.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each field accepts input normally. Dropdowns open on focus, and selections are retained.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Travel Request
narrative_steps.description: After reviewing the filled form, Alex clicks the dark cyan submit button with an icon to send his request.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button at the end of the form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form data is validated and submitted successfully to the backend API, showing a confirmation message or redirecting to a thank-you page.

requirement_tested: A backend API to handle form submissions and store request data in a PostgreSQL database
user_goal: Ensure submitted travel requests are stored correctly in the database.

narrative_steps.title: Receiving Form Submission
narrative_steps.description: The backend receives a POST request containing travel request data from the frontend form submission.
narrative_steps.action: Send a sample POST request to /api/travel-requests with valid payload.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server responds with HTTP 201 Created status indicating successful receipt and processing.

narrative_steps.title: Storing Data in Database
narrative_steps.description: The system processes the incoming data and inserts it into the PostgreSQL database using correct schema mapping.
narrative_steps.action: Check database records for newly inserted travel request.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New record exists in the 'travel_requests' table with matching values from the submitted form.

requirement_tested: Dynamic calculation of travel packages based on customer preferences including hotels, flights, transport, and golf conditions
user_persona: A customer awaiting customized travel options.
user_goal: Receive personalized travel package options based on previously submitted preferences.

narrative_steps.title: Triggering Calculation Service
narrative_steps.description: Once a travel request is received, the system initiates dynamic package calculation by calling external APIs for real-time availability.
narrative_steps.action: Simulate creation of a new travel request entry in the database.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Package calculation service runs asynchronously and retrieves updated availability from hotel, flight, transport, and golf course providers.

narrative_steps.title: Generating Personalized Packages
narrative_steps.description: Using aggregated data and business logic, the system generates several package combinations tailored to the customer's preferences.
narrative_steps.action: Query backend for generated package options associated with the travel request ID.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Multiple package options appear with accurate pricing, inclusions, and relevance to requested preferences.

requirement_tested: A booking confirmation interface where customers can confirm their selected package
user_persona: A customer ready to finalize travel plans.
user_goal: Review and select a suitable travel package then proceed with confirmation.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Package Options
narrative_steps.description: Jordan accesses the package selection page and reviews different travel packages presented in card layouts.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the booking confirmation page URL.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page displays multiple package cards showing destinations, durations, prices, and highlights of included services.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting a Package
narrative_steps.description: Jordan clicks on one of the package cards to expand its details and compare it with others before making a choice.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a package card to expand it.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Selected card expands revealing detailed breakdowns of flights, hotels, golf courses, and other components.

narrative_steps.title: Confirming Booking Selection
narrative_steps.description: Satisfied with the chosen package, Jordan clicks the prominent 'Confirm Booking' button to move forward.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Confirm Booking' button located beneath the expanded package details.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: POST request is made to /api/bookings endpoint saving the selection and redirecting Jordan to a payment gateway.

requirement_tested: Generation and delivery of digital vouchers and invoices upon booking confirmation
user_persona: A traveler expecting official documents post-payment.
user_goal: Receive digital voucher and invoice after completing the booking process.

narrative_steps.title: Completing Payment Process
narrative_steps.description: Taylor finishes paying for her selected travel package online and waits for the necessary documents.
narrative_steps.action: Complete payment transaction via the payment gateway.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Booking status updates to 'confirmed' in the system triggering automatic document generation.

narrative_steps.title: Receiving Digital Documents
narrative_steps.description: Shortly after payment, Taylor receives an email with attached PDF versions of her travel voucher and invoice.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for email delivery to registered email address.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Email arrives with subject line confirming booking and contains two downloadable PDF attachments – one for the voucher and another for the invoice.

requirement_tested: A customer relationship management module accessible via the backend for managing customer data and interactions
user_persona: An admin needing to manage client relationships.
user_goal: Access and update customer information and interaction history.

narrative_steps.title: Logging Into Admin Panel
narrative_steps.description: Admin Riley logs into the secured CRM section to view customer profiles and communications.
narrative_steps.action: Enter valid admin credentials on the login page and click 'Login'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the CRM dashboard with a list of customers displayed in a searchable table format.

narrative_steps.title: Searching for Specific Customer
narrative_steps.description: Riley searches for a particular customer using the name filter to quickly locate their profile.
narrative_steps.action: Type customer's name into the search bar above the customer table.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Customer list filters dynamically, displaying only those matching the search term instantly.

narrative_steps.title: Updating Interaction Notes
narrative_steps.description: After finding the customer, Riley opens the profile to add notes about a recent call discussing travel arrangements.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the customer row to open the profile modal and enter notes in the interaction log form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Notes save successfully and appear in the interaction timeline under the customer’s profile.

requirement_tested: A supplier management module for handling supplier information and contracts
user_persona: An operations manager maintaining supplier partnerships.
user_goal: Manage supplier details and upload contractual agreements.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Supplier Module
narrative_steps.description: Manager Sam navigates to the supplier management section from the admin dashboard sidebar.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Suppliers' link in the main navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Loads the supplier management page displaying a sortable table of current suppliers.

narrative_steps.title: Uploading New Contract Document
narrative_steps.description: Sam uploads a newly signed contract for a golf resort partner by attaching the file to the supplier record.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Upload Contract' next to the relevant supplier row and choose a PDF file to upload.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Contract file uploads successfully and links to the supplier's record in the database.

narrative_steps.title: Editing Supplier Details
narrative_steps.description: Sam notices outdated contact info and edits the supplier’s representative details.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Edit' on the supplier row, modify contact fields, and save changes.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Supplier information updates in the database and reflects immediately in the supplier table.

requirement_tested: An online quote generation feature that provides pricing based on selected options
user_persona: A potential customer seeking preliminary cost estimation.
user_goal: Obtain an instant quote reflecting current market prices adjusted by configured business rules.

narrative_steps.title: Requesting a Quote
narrative_steps.description: Casey has filled out the travel form but wants to see estimated costs before proceeding further.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Get Quote' button after submitting the travel package request.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: System calculates and returns a detailed quote including subtotal, taxes, discounts, and total amount.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Quote Details
narrative_steps.description: Casey examines the returned quote to understand how the price was determined.
narrative_steps.action: Read through the itemized breakdown shown in the frontend quote preview component.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Clear visualization of pricing elements such as base rate, seasonal surcharge, and applicable discounts.

requirement_tested: Frontend pages styled with whitesmoke background color and dark cyan as the primary color for main components
user_goal: Verify consistent application of specified color scheme throughout the website.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Homepage Styling
narrative_steps.description: Designer Morgan inspects the homepage to verify adherence to the defined color palette.
narrative_steps.action: Open browser DevTools and inspect body and main component styles.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Body background color is set to whitesmoke (#F5F5F5) and main interactive components use dark cyan (#008B8B).

narrative_steps.title: Checking Secondary Pages
narrative_steps.description: Morgan moves to secondary pages to ensure uniformity of the styling across the entire site.
narrative_steps.action: Visit additional pages like booking confirmation and CRM dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Same background and accent colors consistently applied regardless of page context.

requirement_tested: User authentication and authorization for secure access to CRM and supplier modules
user_goal: Log in securely and access restricted areas with appropriate permissions.

narrative_steps.title: Attempting Unauthorized Access
narrative_steps.description: Admin Dana tries to access the CRM module directly without logging in first.
narrative_steps.action: Attempt to navigate to /admin/customers without prior authentication.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the login page due to lack of valid authentication token.

narrative_steps.title: Authenticating Credentials
narrative_steps.description: Dana enters her username and password to gain access to the admin panel.
narrative_steps.action: Enter valid credentials in the login form and click Submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Successfully logged in with a secure JWT token issued and redirected to the admin dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Restricted Modules
narrative_steps.description: Now authenticated, Dana attempts to access both CRM and supplier management sections.
narrative_steps.action: Click links for 'Customers' and 'Suppliers' in the sidebar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both modules load successfully since Dana holds admin privileges granting full access rights.

requirement_tested: API endpoints for retrieving and updating booking statuses
user_persona: A backend developer testing API behavior.
user_goal: Use RESTful endpoints to check and modify booking statuses programmatically.

narrative_steps.title: Fetching Booking Details
narrative_steps.description: Developer Lee makes a GET request to retrieve the current status of a specific booking.
narrative_steps.action: Make GET request to /api/bookings/{booking_id}.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Returns JSON response with booking details including current status field.

narrative_steps.title: Updating Booking Status
narrative_steps.description: Lee updates the booking status from 'pending' to 'confirmed' using a PATCH request.
narrative_steps.action: Issue a PATCH request to /api/bookings/{id}/status with {new_status: 'confirmed'} payload.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Booking status updates in the database and returns success response code 200 OK.

requirement_tested: Email notification system for sending confirmations, vouchers, and invoices to customers
user_goal: Receive automated emails at key stages of the booking lifecycle.

narrative_steps.title: Booking Confirmation Trigger
narrative_steps.description: After confirming a booking, Morgan expects to receive an immediate confirmation email.
narrative_steps.action: Change booking status to 'confirmed' in the system.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Automated email is queued and sent to Morgan’s registered email address with booking details.

narrative_steps.title: Document Delivery Follow-Up
narrative_steps.description: Soon after, Morgan anticipates receiving the official voucher and invoice via email.
narrative_steps.action: Monitor inbox for subsequent email with attachments.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Second email arrives shortly afterward containing downloadable PDF copies of the travel voucher and invoice.

requirement_tested: Admin dashboard for viewing and managing all bookings, quotes, and customer requests
user_persona: An operations lead overseeing daily activities.
user_goal: Monitor overall activity and respond to pending tasks efficiently.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing the Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Lead Tracy logs in and goes straight to the admin dashboard to get a snapshot of ongoing activities.
narrative_steps.action: Log in as admin and land on the default dashboard route.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dashboard renders with overview charts, tables showing recent bookings, quotes, and unresolved customer requests.

narrative_steps.title: Filtering Operational Data
narrative_steps.description: Tracy uses filters to narrow down bookings to those requiring attention today.
narrative_steps.action: Adjust date range filter above the bookings table to show today's entries.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Table updates dynamically to reflect filtered dataset helping Tracy prioritize urgent matters.

requirement_tested: Integration with external services for real-time availability checking of hotels, flights, and golf courses
user_persona: A system integrator ensuring seamless connectivity.
user_goal: Validate that external API connections provide up-to-date availability data.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Availability Checks
narrative_steps.description: Integrator Kim simulates a travel request to trigger calls to external APIs for live availability.
narrative_steps.action: Submit a test travel request with realistic parameters.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Backend services call respective external APIs and return current availability data for hotels, flights, and golf courses.

narrative_steps.title: Validating Response Accuracy
narrative_steps.description: Kim verifies that the retrieved data aligns with actual offerings from the integrated partners.
narrative_steps.action: Compare API responses with known live data sources.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Returned data matches source provider inventories proving accurate real-time synchronization.

requirement_tested: Responsive design ensuring usability across desktop and mobile devices
user_persona: A frequent traveler accessing services on mobile.
user_goal: Seamlessly use the website on a smartphone without layout issues.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Site on Mobile Device
narrative_steps.description: Traveler Noah opens the website on his smartphone to start planning a trip.
narrative_steps.action: Open website URL on a mobile browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Site loads responsively adapting layout for small screen with stacked form fields and touch-friendly controls.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting With Responsive Elements
narrative_steps.description: Noah fills out the travel form and selects options using touch gestures rather than mouse clicks.
narrative_steps.action: Tap on input fields, dropdown menus, and submit button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All interactive elements respond smoothly to touch events, maintaining usability despite smaller viewport size.
